entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
